! DriveNets DNOS Configuration - Flattened View
! Generated: 2024-01-10 12:00:00 UTC
! Software Version: DNOS 22.4.1
!
hostname DN-SA-01
!
interface Management0
  ip address 10.10.10.1 255.255.255.0
  no shutdown
!
interface Loopback0
  ip address 192.168.0.1 255.255.255.255
  no shutdown
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
  description "Uplink to Core Router"
  ip address 172.16.1.1 255.255.255.252
  mtu 9000
  no shutdown
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1
  description "Downlink to Access Switch"
  ip address 172.16.2.1 255.255.255.252
  no shutdown
!
router bgp 65000
  bgp router-id 192.168.0.1
  neighbor 10.10.10.2 remote-as 65001
  neighbor 172.16.1.2 remote-as 65002
  address-family ipv4 unicast
    network 192.168.0.1/32
    redistribute connected
!
ip route 0.0.0.0/0 10.10.10.254
!
logging host 10.10.10.100
logging level informational
!
ntp server 10.10.10.50
!
snmp-server community public ro
snmp-server contact admin@example.com
snmp-server location "Data Center A, Rack 12"
!
line console
  exec-timeout 30
!
line vty 0 15
  transport input ssh
  exec-timeout 60
!
end
